purpleculture_pinyin:
jīn
muscle; tendon; veins visible under the skin; sth resembling tendons or veins (e.g. fiber in a vegetable)
мышца; сухожилие; под кожей видны вены; что-то похожее на сухожилия или вены (например, клетчатка в овощах)

heisig_chinese_memo: A tendon connects muscle to the bone so is a part of the body that gives strength, and can be both supple and tense like the bamboo.
heisig_constituent: muscle, bamboo, moon, month, flesh, part of the body, power, muscle, arnold
heisig_story: Bamboo . . . part of the body . . . power. Here we see how the primitive meaning of muscle was derived from the kanji for power.
Keyword_KANJIDIC: muscle, sinew, tendon, fiber, plot, plan, descent

koohiiStory1: Muscle is part of the body that gives strength, and can be both supple and tense like the bamboo.
koohiiStory2: Lifting BAMBOO STICKS is an old way for your BODY to put on lots of MUSCLE.
jp_example_words:
粗筋(あらすじ): outline, summary
大筋(おおすじ): outline, summary
一筋(ひとすき): a line, earnestly, blindly, straightforwardly
筋肉(きんにく): muscle, sinew
筋(すじ): muscle, string, line, stripe, plot, plan, sinew
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: This bamboo absorbed the moon's power, and you want that power in your body, so you surgically insert them into your body to replace your muscles and tendons.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture your new bamboo muscles glowing under your skin with the moon's power. You flex and feel the power coursing through you!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Your special muscles and tendons have become famous and the King (きん) of England has requested that you appear in his court! It looks like he wants you to teach his barber surgeons how you got your new muscles.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine standing before the King, explaining in detail how you cut yourself open and replaced your weak human meat with the special muscles you have now. He's staring intently at you, but more so at your shining body than your mouth as you talk.
Ru_Meaning: muscle, sinew, tendon, fiber, plot, plan, descent

Kanshudo_mnemonic: ribs (肋) like bamboo (⺮) = strong muscles
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: A tendon connects muscle to the bone so is a part of the body that gives strength, and can be  both supple and tense like the bamboo.
humanum_full_description_en:
From "force", from " meat ", from " bamboo ", the original meaning is tendon or ligament attached to bone. "Shuowen": "The power of the flesh. The strength from the meat is from bamboo, bamboo, and the thing with many tendons. All tendons belong to the tendons." "Zhou Li‧ Tianguan‧ Ulcer Acid nourishes the bones, nourishes the muscles with pungent, and nourishes the veins with salt."

" Tin " can refer to the venous tube. "Pipe ‧ Water Land": "The person who is in water, the blood of the earth, is like the flow of tendons and veins."

" Strongs " in modern Chinese also refer to things like somersaults, such as "rebars" and "rubber bands."
humanum_short_description_en: From "force", from " meat ", from " bamboo ", the original meaning is tendon or ligament attached to bone.
humanum_full_description:
從」力」，從「肉」，從「竹」，本義為肌腱或附在骨頭上的韌帶。《說文》：「肉之力也。从力从肉从竹，竹，物之多筋者。凡筋之屬皆从筋。」 《周禮‧天官‧瘍醫》：「凡藥，以酸養骨，以辛養筋，以鹹養脈。」

　　「筋」可指靜脈管。《管子‧水地》：「水者，地之血氣，如筋脈之通流者也。」

　　「筋」在現代漢語中也指像筋鬥東西，如「鋼筋」、「橡皮筋」。
humanum_short_description: 從」力」，從「肉」，從「竹」，本義為肌腱或附在骨頭上的韌帶。

從」力」，從「 肉 」，從「 竹 」，本義為肌腱或附在骨頭上的韌帶。《說文》：「肉之力也。从力从肉从竹，竹，物之多筋者。凡筋之屬皆从筋。」 《周禮‧天官‧瘍醫》：「凡藥，以酸養骨，以辛養筋，以鹹養脈。」 「 筋 」可指靜脈管。《管子‧水地》：「水者，地之血氣，如筋脈之通流者也。」 「 筋 」在現代漢語中也指像筋鬥東西，如「鋼筋」、「橡皮筋」。
From "force", from " meat", from " bamboo", the original meaning is tendon or ligament attached to bone. "Shuowen": "The power of the flesh. The strength from the meat is from bamboo, bamboo, and the thing with many tendons. All tendons belong to the tendons." "Zhou Li‧ Tianguan‧ Ulcer Acid nourishes the bones, nourishes the muscles with pungent, and nourishes the veins with salt." " Tin" can refer to the venous tube. "Pipe ‧ Water Land": "The person who is in water, the blood of the earth, is like the flow of tendons and veins." " Strongs" in modern Chinese also refer to things like somersaults, such as "rebars" and "rubber bands."

筋字的基本解释

筋
jīn
肌肉的俗称：筋力。筋肉。筋疲力尽。
肌腱或附着在骨头上的韧带：筋骨。筋道（“道”读轻声）。蹄筋。
可见的皮下静脉的俗称：筋络。筋脉。青筋暴露。
像筋的东西：钢筋。橡皮筋儿。

筋字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jīn］
［《廣韻》舉欣切，平欣，見。］
亦作“1”。
(1)肌肉；肌腱或附在骨头上的韧带。
(2)像筋般的东西。
(3)静脉管。参见“筋絡”、“筋脈”。
(4)植物的脉络。参见“筋絡”。

筋字的英文翻译

◎ 筋
muscle, tendon, veins that stand out

筋字的康熙字典解释

【未集上】【竹字部】　筋； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页882第26
〔古文〕竻【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】舉欣切【正韻】居銀切，?音斤。【說文】肉之力也。从肉从力从竹。竹，物之多筋者。【禮·曲禮】老者不以筋力爲禮。【周禮·天官·醫師】凡藥以辛養筋。【釋名】筋，力也。肉中之力，氣之元也，靳固于身形也。　【博雅】北方之美者，有幽都之筋角焉。　又竹名。【戴凱之·竹譜】筋竹，長二丈許，圍數寸，至堅利，南土以爲矛。其筍未成竹時，堪爲弩絃。　又藥名。【本草】白茅根，一名土筋。　又姓，出【姓苑】。　又【集韻】渠焉切，音乾。大腱也。　【篇海】俗作䈥。

筋字的源字形

筋字的起名意思

指肌腱或附着在骨上的韧带，后泛指像筋那样的东西，如钢筋。

Tendons
Basic explanation of words
Tendons
jīn
Common name for muscle: muscle strength. Muscles. exhausted.
Tendons or ligaments attached to bones: muscles and bones. Jindao ("Tao" read softly). Tendons.
Common name for visible subcutaneous veins: Jinluo. Tendons. The green veins are exposed.
Something like ribs: steel bars. Rubber bands.
Tendons
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jīn］
["Guang Yun" Ju Xinqie, Ping Xin, see you. ]
Also known as "1".
(1) Muscles; tendons or ligaments attached to bones.
(2) Something like tendons.
(3) Intravenous tube. See "Tin and collaterals", "Tin and veins".
(4) Context of plants. See "Tendin Network".
Tendons

muscle, tendon, veins that stand out

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set on] [Bamboo Character Department] 　筋; Kangxi strokes: 12; Page number: page 882 26
[Ancient text] bun [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Ju Xin Qi [Zheng Yun] in silver cutting,? Yin Jin. [Said the text] The power of meat is also. From the flesh to the strength from the bamboo. Bamboo, the thing with many tendons. 【Rite·Curriculum】The elderly do not regard their muscle strength as a gift. 【Zhou Li·Tian Guan·Physician】All medicines are used to nourish muscles. [Release name] Tendons, strength. The power in the flesh is the source of qi, and Jin Gu is also in his body shape.　【Boya】The beauty of the north has the tendons and corners of the secluded capital.　Also named bamboo. 【Dai Kaizhi·Bamboo Spectrum】Strong bamboo, two feet long, several inches in circumference, very strong, and the southern soil is considered a spear. When the bamboo shoots have not yet become bamboos, they can be regarded as crossbow strings.　Also the name of the medicine. [Materia Medica] Imperata cylindrica root, a soil tendon.　Another surname, out [surname garden].　 [Ji Yun] Qu Yan cut, sound dry. Big tendon too.　【Pianhai】The vulgar works.
Tendons
Source glyph
Tendons
Name meaning
Refers to tendons or ligaments attached to bones, and later refers to things like tendons, such as steel bars.
会意字。从竹(像两枝竹叶),从肉(像一块肉,表示肉体),从力(像耕地的犁,表示力气),合起来表示身体内像竹
子那样有弹力的是韧带。本义是韧带。

筋
jīn
小小
筋筋
Зная слово.
Бамбук (как два бамбуковых листа), плоть (как кусок мяса, выражающий плоть) и сила (как плуг в поле, выражающий силу) вместе означают, что связки в теле эластичны, как бамбук.
Первоначальное значение - связка.
① Связки на сухожилиях или костях: ~ коллатерали | копыта ~ "снятие шкуры ~. 2 подкожные вены: синие ~. Такие вещи, как сухожилия: стальные ~ | лист ~" лицо ~. ④ Старое название мышцы: ~ кость | ~ Мясо.
~ Борьба ~ Кость ~ Сухожилие ~ Пульс ~ Мозг ~~ Истощение
Сухожилия
Маленький
Сухожилие
jīn
1) мускул, мышца
2) сухожилие, связка
扭了筋 растянуть связки
3) жила, вена
粗了脖红了筋 вздулась шея, побагровели жилы
4) прожилки
甘蓝有筋嚼不动 в капусте много прожилок ― её не прожевать
5) арматура
Radicals: 竹, 月, 力  (bamboo, moon, power)
Meaning Mnemonic
This bamboo absorbed the moon's power, and you want that power in your body, so you surgically insert them into your body to replace your muscles and tendons.
Picture your new bamboo muscles glowing under your skin with the moon's power. You flex and feel the power coursing through you!
Reading Mnemonic
Your special muscles and tendons have become famous and the King (きん) of England has requested that you appear in his court! It looks like he wants you to teach his barber surgeons how you got your new muscles.
Imagine standing before the King, explaining in detail how you cut yourself open and replaced your weak human meat with the special muscles you have now. He's staring intently at you, but more so at your shining body than your mouth as you talk.
